"Crawford": "All set?"
"Alright, before we jump into the main topic, let's gather our bearings."
"Do you have any questions for me?"
"About Halpha"
"About ARKS"
"About Zephetto"
"About the Starless"

"This planet we live on, Halpha, was recently discovered to be the testing grounds for Resurgent ARKS experimentation."
"All in an effort to create the ARKS, as way of combatting the Starless."
"It all beggars belief, but our current circumstances would suggest it's likely the truth..."
"We now know that we ARKS were created in order to fight the Starless..."
"I expect it will take time for everyone on Halpha to come to terms with this reality."
"Honestly, I haven't yet entirely been able to sort out my own feelings on the matter..."
"The Governor of Resurgent ARKS, and administrator of the experiments on Halpha..."
"Outside of that, not much is known about the man."
"After your battle with him, he went to confront the Starless that suddenly appeared, yes?"
"His whereabouts since are unknown..."
"An unknown enemy... That's the best way I can describe them."
"Are they living beings? Are they machines? When will they arrive?..."
"...There is far too much we don't know."
"That they pose an even greater threat than Dark Falz..."
"I think that much is safe to say."
"Alright, understood."
